title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly define social movements.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe two different examples of a social movement, each one within a different AP Comparative Government and Politics course country. Tasks B1 and B2 represent the description for each example/country.

For Task C, for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in Task B, explain how the social movements have influenced government policies.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes all five of the tasks set by the question.
